attributes.action: Reconsider the Role of Policing in Favour of Multiple Role-Dependant Services.
attributes.additional_details: We need to reconsider the role policing takes in our society, as public outrage grows not just in the UK, but around the world, over police brutality. Now is the time to redirect public resources away from traditional policing and find real alternatives. In the UK alone, if you're black, you're FIVE times more likely to be stopped and searched, alongside a shocking statistic that anyone who isn't white are TWICE as likely to die after being restrained. Policing in the UK needs to be reformed now
attributes.background: Replace the existing systems of policing in favour of multiple departments, such as Mental Health, Traffic, Violent Crime, Gender and Investigative Services to name a few. Currently, police officers are required for all of these.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand you'd like changes to policing, but we're not sure how you'd like things to change.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
